participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and creative, I enjoy hosting events and bringing people together.
participant_1.background: I live in a house where I'm not allowed to bring my bladed weapons into the kitchen. I am good at throwing parties. I have a home in the country where I can bake and cook to my heart's content. I love eating barbeque sandwiches and pizza puffs. I am a graphic designer.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Passionate and dedicated, I thrive on creative expression and enjoy meaningful interactions.
participant_2.background: My video game collection is my most valued material possession because it reminds me of the good times I had playing games with my family and friends. I volunteer walking dogs twice a week. I have been acting since I was ten years old. I have a job that allows me to work from home so I can spend more time with my family. My temper is pretty short.

content.text: What's up?
I'm doing good, just finished acting in a play. What are you up to?
Not much, just got home from work. I'm a graphic designer.
Oh cool, I'm an actor.
That's awesome! Do you do theater or film?
I do both, but I prefer theater.
Why's that?
Because I like the live audience interaction.
That makes sense. I've never been to a play before.
You should go! There are so many great plays out there.
I will have to check them out.
You won't regret it!
Do you have any pets?
Yes, I have a dog and a cat.
Aw, that's cute. What are their names?
My dog's name is Buddy and my cat's name is Mittens.
I like those names.
Thanks! They're both pretty cool pets.
Do you like to cook?
Yes, I love to cook. I'm actually really good at it.
That's awesome! I'm a pretty good cook too.
We should have a cook-off sometime.
That would be fun!
We could even make it a potluck.
That's a great idea
